subject: Re: [junit] How could i get a Testname / Test status in JUnit
msgSnippet: murali, There is currently no even moderately easy way* to put something in a suite class that will cause a Rule to be applied to every method in every
messageBody:
murali,

There is currently no even moderately easy way* to put something in a
suite class that will cause a Rule to be applied to every method in
every contained test class, which is what you appear to be doing. If
you're using JUnitCore, you should be able to use
JUnitCore.addRunListener to get what you want, though. Let me know if
I've understood the problem right.

David Saff

* However, there is a way that you can write a subclass of Suite that
_does_ enable this kind of functionality. If someone wanted to write
such a subclass, and submit it as a project in junit.contrib, I'd
welcome it...
